headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Discounts
content:
Those looking to take down the Diamond Casino & Resort for all its worth can cut a good deal this week, with 40% off the cost of all Arcade properties, as well as 30% off the Master Control Terminal and all Arcade Cabinets.

In addition to the above, take advantage of sales and discounts on a range of vehicles:

- Progen PR4 - 40% Off
- Ocelot R88 - 40% Off
- Grotti Brioso 300 - 30% Off
- RC Bandito - 40% Off

And more! Check out the Rockstar Newswire for more details.
